name: Submarine Warfare Plus
description:
Become a Hero by stopping the underwater invasion. Sink the enemy submarines before it is too late, but avoid sinking your Alliance's submarines. You are our last hope!

This game includes 4 leaderboards, 27 levels and 2 play modes (Deep Sea and Survival).

Compete against the Best players, world wide.

This Plus version includes :

> No Ads
> Faster cannon reload (2 seconds to automatically reload instead of 3 seconds)
> 57 achievements instead of 43
